import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { KTSVG, toAbsoluteUrl } from '_metronic/helpers' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { actions } from '../../redux/OrdersRedux' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Modal, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "reactstrap" import { useSelector, shallowEqual } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from 'setup' import { Group } from '../../models/Order' type Props = { show: boolean close: () => void } const AddManualModal: React.FC = ({ show, close }) => { const role: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.role, shallowEqual) as string || "" const balance: number = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.balance, shallowEqual) as number || 0 const adding: boolean = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.adding, shallowEqual) as boolean || false const groups: Group[] = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.groups, shallowEqual) as Group[] || [] const dispatch = useDispatch() const [max_thread, setMax_thread] = useState(5) const [channel_id, setChannel_id] = useState("") const [list_video, setList_video] = useState("") // const [view_need, setView_need] = useState(1000) const [premium_rate,setPremium_rate]=useState(5) const [view_percent,setView_percent]=useState(30) // const [home_rate,setHome_rate]=useState(25) const [search_rate,setSearch_rate]=useState(25) const [suggest_rate,setSuggest_rate]=useState(25) const [direct_rate,setDirect_rate]=useState(25) // const [like_rate,setLike_rate]=useState(25) const [comment_rate,setComment_rate]=useState(25) const [mobile_rate,setMobile_rate]=useState(0) // const [note, setNote] = useState("") const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState("") const [comment_list, setComment_list] = useState("") const [group_id, setGroup] = useState(0) // const [enabled,setEnabled]=useState(1) const dismissModal = () => { dispatch(actions.clearcurrentOrder()) } const submit = () => { if (view_need % 100 !== 0 || view_need ==0) { alert("Số sub cần chạy phải chia hết cho 100") return } if (list_video.trim() === "") { alert("Điền danh video cần chạy") return } if (channel_id.trim() === "") { alert("Điền id kênh cần chạy") return } if(home_rate+search_rate+suggest_rate+direct_rate !=100){ alert("Tổng nguồn view không đúng") return } if(like_rate>100||like_rate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ like không đúng") return } if(view_percent>100||view_percent<0){ alert("phần trăm xem video không đúng") return } if(comment_rate>100||comment_rate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ comment không đúng") return } dispatch(actions.addOrderManualRequest({ channel_id, list_video, home_rate, note, direct_rate, view_need, comment_rate, mobile_rate, search_rate, enabled, max_thread, group_id, like_rate, comment_list, suggest_rate, premium_rate, keyword, view_percent })) } useEffect(() => { if (!adding) { close() } }, [adding]) return (
Thêm nhiệm vụ với danh sách thủ công

Cài đặt đơn

setChannel_id(e.target.value)} /> setList_video(e.target.value)} />

Số lượng chạy

setMax_thread(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setPremium_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Nguồn view tổng = 100%

setHome_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSearch_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSuggest_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setDirect_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Cài đặt tương tác

setLike_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setComment_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMobile_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setView_percent(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" />
setNote(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" type={"text"} /> setComment_list(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" style={{ height: "200px" }} type={"textarea"} /> setKeyword(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" type={"text"} /> setGroup(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={group_id} > { groups.map((item: Group) => { return }) } setEnabled(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={enabled} >
) } export default AddManualModal
